20110108035456.000|20110108035458.000|TR0|COOPER:  Well, more in our month-long look 
20110108035458.000|20110108035459.000|TR0|at some of the most notorious cold cases.  
20110108035459.000|20110108035501.000|TR0|Next week we look back at the case of 
20110108035501.000|20110108035503.000|TR0|Amber Hagerman, an 8-year-old taken from a 
20110108035503.000|20110108035505.000|TR0|parking lot in Texas.  Her abduction and 
20110108035505.000|20110108035507.000|TR0|murder led to the launch of the Amber 
20110108035507.000|20110108035509.000|TR0|Alert system that saved countless lives.  
20110108035509.000|20110108035511.000|TR0|It's little comfort, probably, for Amber's 
20110108035511.000|20110108035513.000|TR0|family.  No arrests have ever been made in
